member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Transforms the given string to a hexadecimal string, using the MD5 encryption algorithm.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given string to its true/false-like equivalent.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given string to a 16-bit signed integer.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given string to a 32-bit signed integer.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given string to a 64-bit signed integer.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given string to DateTime struct.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstCharacter(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the same string with the first character to upper case.
member.returns: A with the first character to upper case.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the string partial between the start and end substrings, starting from a given index.
member.returns: A representing the part between start and end.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the cyrilic letters to their latin equvalent.
member.returns: A representing the value converted to latin.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the latin letters to their cyrilic equvalent.
member.returns: A representing the value converted to cyrilic.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string value to a new string that adheres to the rules of a valid latin username.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFilename(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string value to a new string that adheres to the rules of a valid latin filename.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return a substring from the start of the value, with length equal to charsCount. If charsCount is equal or greater than the string value's length, will substring to the value's length.
member.param: The number of characters from the start.
member.returns: A representing the target number of characters from the start.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the file extension part of a given string value, if there is any. Otherwise, returns an empty string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the file content type of a given string value, if there is any. Otherwise, returns a default content type ("application/octet-stream").
member.returns: A representing the file content type.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Copies the characters in the string value to a byte array, and return a reference to it.
member.returns: A byte array representing the characters in the string value.
